entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:59 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 9:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -26.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -29.2°C
Wind: NW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
